title: Beach Babe Bicycling Classic 2016 - Women's Ride
desc: Yes, bring your driver's license photo ID to check in and an electronic copy of your ticket for us to scan. Park at the Aquarium of the Pacific or Pike parking structures ($15 all day) or park nearby and ride to the event starting area at Pierpoint Landing (look for the lighthouse). Bring a bike in good working order, repair/patch kit, ID, personal first aid kit (bandaids, sunscreen) water bottles attached to your bike for refilling, and be ready for a great time. No ride-alongs without registration - you will lose your registration privileges. info@CaliforniaGirlSeries.com or call Jana? Noble at (916) 705-3443. No, tickets are not transferrable or refundable. Rollover to another event is available for $25 processing fee.
